craftable.name: Bloodthirster
craftable.add_attrs:
Grant 20% Omnivamp.

Once per combat: At 40% Health, gain a 25% maximum Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

Omnivamp: heal for a percentage of damage dealt

radiant.name: RadientBloodthirster
radiant.add_attrs:
Damage heals the holder for 35% of the damage dealt. Upon falling below 40% Health, the holder gains a 35% max Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds.

Radiant Bonus: +20% Attack Damage

craftable.name: BrambleVest
craftable.add_attrs:
Negates 75% bonus damage from incoming critical strikes. When struck by an attack, deal 75/100/150 ★ magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 2.5 seconds).

[Direct damage item]

radiant.name: RadientBrambleVest
radiant.add_attrs: Negates all bonus damage from incoming critical strikes. On being hit by an attack, deal 125/175/225★ magic damage to all nearby enemies (once every 1.5 seconds).

craftable.name: DragonsClaw
craftable.add_attrs: Every 2 seconds, regenerate 4% maximum Health.

radiant.name: RadientDragonsClaw
radiant.add_attrs: Every 1.5 seconds, regenerate 8% maximum Health.

craftable.name: Fimbulwinter
craftable.add_attrs:
Once per combat: At 40% Health, gain a 25% maximum Health shield that lasts up to 5 seconds and 35 Armor and Magic Resist for the rest of combat.

​​[Aura item]

radiant.name: FimbulwinterRadiant
radiant.add_attrs: Once per combat: At 40% Health, gain a 60 Armor and Magic Resist for the rest of combat, and a 50% maximum Health shield that lasts up to 10 seconds.

craftable.name: GiantSlayer
craftable.add_attrs: Abilities and attacks deal 25% more damage to enemies with more than 1600 maximum Health.

radiant.name: RadientGiantSlayer
radiant.add_attrs: Abilities and attacks deal 70% more damage to enemies with more than 1600 maximum Health.

craftable.name: GuinsoosRageblade
craftable.add_attrs: Attacks grant 5% bonus Attack Speed. This effect stacks.

radiant.name: RadientGuinsoosRageblade
radiant.add_attrs: Attacks grant +10% bonus Attack Speed.This effect stacks.

craftable.name: HandofJustice
craftable.add_attrs:
Grant 2 effects:
- +15 Attack Damage and +15 Ability Power.
- 15% Omnivamp.

Each round, randomly double 1 of these effects.

Omnivamp: heal for a percentage of damage dealt

radiant.name: RadientHandofJustice
radiant.add_attrs:
Grant 2 effects:
+50 Attack Damage and +50 Ability Power.
Attacks and Abilities heal for 30% of damage dealt.

craftable.name: HextechGunblade
craftable.add_attrs: Grant 22% Omnivamp. Damage heals the lowest percent Health ally for the same amount.

radiant.name: RadientHextechGunblade
radiant.add_attrs: The holder's damage heal them for 35% of the damage dealt. The holder also heals their lowest health ally for the same amount.

craftable.name: InfinityEdge
craftable.add_attrs: Damage from an Ability can critically strike.

radiant.name: RadientInfinityEdge
radiant.add_attrs: Damage from an Ability can critically strike.

craftable.name: IonicSpark
craftable.add_attrs:
50% Shred enemies within 2 hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, they are also zapped for magic damage equal to 185% of their maximum Mana.

[Direct damage item]
Shred: reduce Magic Resist

radiant.name: RadientIonicSpark
radiant.add_attrs:
50% Shred enemies within 3 hexes. When enemies cast an Ability, they are alsol zapped for magic damage equal to 250% of their maximum Mana.

Also, regenerate 1% maximum Health per second

craftable.name: LastWhisper
craftable.add_attrs:
Any physical damage dealt Sunder the target for 5 seconds. This effect does not stack.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
Sunder: reduce Armor by 50%

radiant.name: RadientLastWhisper
radiant.add_attrs:
Any physical damage dealt the 50% Sunders the target for the rest of combat. This effect does not stack.

[Unique - only one per champion]
Sunder: reduce Armor

craftable.name: LocketoftheIronSolari
craftable.add_attrs:
Combat start: Shield the holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row for 300/350/400★ damage for 15 seconds.

[Aura item]

radiant.name: RadientLocketoftheIronSolari
radiant.add_attrs:
When combat begins, the holder and all allies within 3 hexes in the same row gain a shield that blocks 350 / 400 / 450★ damage for 60 seconds.

Radiant Bonus: Grants 200 Health for all allies at the start of combat.

craftable.name: Morellonomicon
craftable.add_attrs:
Magic or true damage from an Ability 10% Burns and 33% Wounds enemies for the 10 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

radiant.name: RadientMorellonomicon
radiant.add_attrs:
Magic or true damage from the holder's Ability 60% Burns and 33% Wounds enemies for 30 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Burn: deals some of the target's maximum Health as true damage
Wound: reduces healing received

craftable.name: Quicksilver
craftable.add_attrs:
Combat start: Grant immunity to crowd control for 15 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

radiant.name: RadientQuicksilver
radiant.add_attrs:
Combat start: Grant immunity to crowd control for 30 seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

craftable.name: RabadonsDeathcap
craftable.add_attrs: Grants 70 bonus Ability Power

radiant.name: RadientRabadonsDeathcap
radiant.add_attrs: It's witnessed - and unleashed - miracles and calamities both.

craftable.name: RapidFirecannon
craftable.add_attrs: Grant 2 bonus Attack Range and your attacks cannot miss.

radiant.name: RadientRapidFirecannon
radiant.add_attrs: Grant 2 bonus Attack Range and 125% Attack Speed, your attacks cannot miss.

craftable.name: Redemption
craftable.add_attrs:
Heal allies within 1 hex for 15% of their missing Health every 5 seconds. They also take 25% less multi-target damage for 5 seconds (damage reduction does not stack).

[Aura item]

radiant.name: RadientRedemption
radiant.add_attrs: Heal allies within 2 hexes for 25% of their missing Health every 25% seconds. They take 25% less multi-target damage for 5 seconds(damage reduction does not stack).

craftable.name: RunaansHurricane
craftable.add_attrs:
Attacks fire a bolt at a nearby enemy, dealing 50% Attack Damage as physical damage.

[Direct damage item]

radiant.name: RadientRunaansHurricane
radiant.add_attrs:
Grant 20% Attack Damage. Attacks fire a bolt at another nearby enemy, dealing 100% Attack Damage as physical damage.

Also, gain 20% Attack Speed.

craftable.name: SpearofShojin
craftable.add_attrs: Every 3rd attacks restores 20 additional Mana.

radiant.name: RadientSpearofShojin
radiant.add_attrs: Every third attack restores 40 additional Mana.

craftable.name: StatikkShiv
craftable.add_attrs:
Every 3rd attack unleashes chain lightning that bounces to 4 enemies, dealing 30 magic damage and Shredding them for 5 seconds.

[Direct damage item]
Shred: reduce Magic Resist by 50%%

radiant.name: RadientStatikkShiv
radiant.add_attrs: Every third attack unleashes chain lightning that bounces to 8 enemies, dealing 65 magic damage and reducing their Magic Resist by 50% for 5 seconds.

craftable.name: SunfireCape
craftable.add_attrs:
Every 2 seconds, an enemy within 2 hexes is 10% Burned and 33% Wounded for 10 seconds.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]
Burn: deals some of the target's maximum Health as true damage
Wound: reduces healing received

radiant.name: RadientSunfireCape
radiant.add_attrs:
Every 1.5 seconds, a random enemy within 3 hexes is burned for 60% of their maximum Health as true damage over 30 seconds. Any healing they receive is reduced by 33%.

[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

craftable.name: ThiefsGloves
craftable.add_attrs:
Each round: Equip 2 random items.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]

radiant.name: RadientThiefsGloves
radiant.add_attrs:
Each round: Equip 2 random Radiant items.

[Consumes 3 item slots]

craftable.name: TitansResolve
craftable.add_attrs:
Grant 2% Attack Damage and 2 Ability Power when attacking or taking damage, stacking up to 25 times.

At full stacks, grant 25 Armor and Magic Resist.

radiant.name: RadientTitansResolve
radiant.add_attrs:
Grant 3% Attack Damage 3 Ability Power when attacking or taking damage, stacking up to 25 times.

At full stacks, gain 50 Armor and Magic Resist.

craftable.name: WarmogsArmor
craftable.add_attrs: Grant 800 bonus Health.

radiant.name: RadientWarmogsArmor
radiant.add_attrs:
Grants 1000 bonus Health (including components).

Radiant Bonus: Regenerate 1% max Health per second

craftable.name: ZekesHerald
craftable.add_attrs:
Combat start: Grant 20% Attack Speed to the holder and allies within 1 hex in the same row.

[Aura item]

radiant.name: RadientZekesHerald
radiant.add_attrs: Combat start: Grant 50% Attack Speed and 10% Omjnivamp to the holder and allies within  1 hex in the same row.

craftable.name: Zephyr
craftable.add_attrs:
Combat start: Summon a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 5 seconds.

[Ignores crowd control immunity.]
[Unique - Only One Per Champion]

radiant.name: RadientZephyr
radiant.add_attrs:
Combat start: Summon a whirlwind on the opposite side of the arena that removes the closest enemy from combat for 8 seconds.
Your team gains 15% Attack Speed.

[Ignores crowd control immunity]
[Unique - only 1 per champion]

craftable.name: ZzRotPortal
craftable.add_attrs:
Combat start: Taunt.

On death, a Voidspawn arises, Taunting nearby enemies. That summoned units will not have as much effectiveness.

Taunt: enemies that are able and in range must attack the taunter

radiant.name: RadientZzRotPortal
radiant.add_attrs:
Combat start: A Radiant Voidmother with bonus Health and Attack Damage arises and Taunts nearby enemies.

Taunt: enemies that are able and in range must attack the taunter
